welcome.greeting: What can Kilo Code do for you?
welcome.introText: I've been trained on the fastest AI models available and I am ready to generate code for you at warp speed!

lowCreditWarning.lowBalance: Your Kilo Code balance is low

condense.wantsToCondense: Kilo Code wants to condense your conversation

signUp.title: Sign up with Kilo Code
signUp.description: Signing up with Kilo Code gives you free credits to get started. Use your credits to explore our features, try out the latest and greatest models, and experience the benefits of Kilo Code without any commitment.
signUp.termsAndPrivacy: By continuing, you agree to the <termsLink>Terms of Service</termsLink> and <privacyLink>Privacy Policy.</privacyLink>
